title: Starship/Super Heavy lifts off on second flight
summary: SpaceX’s Starship vehicle reached space on its second integrated test flight Nov. 18 but broke apart late in its ascent after successfully demonstrating the performance of its booster and a new stage separation technique.

title: Starship’s second test flight: where to watch
summary: SpaceX's Starship reached an altitude of 148 kilometers shortly after the vehicle's Super Heavy booster broke apart moments after separation.

title: SpaceX’s Starship rocket reaches space but is intentionally destroyed mid-flight
summary: SpaceX launched its second Starship rocket flight on Saturday, with the company pushing development of the mammoth vehicle past new milestones.

title: Investors grant Astra extension on loan
summary: Investors in launch vehicle and spacecraft propulsion company Astra Space have given the company a four-day extension on a loan to provide the company more time to line up a longer-term funding deal.

title: SpaceX Starship set for repeat test flight, seven months after last one blew up
summary: SpaceX's next-generation spacecraft Starship, developed to carry astronauts to the moon and beyond, was set for blastoff on Saturday for a repeat test launch from south Texas, seven months after its first attempt to reach space ended with an explosion.
